cons: I did not experience any negatives.

review_title: Do not waste your time here.
job_title: Front Office Staff in Tampa, FL
pros: I liked switching from one office to the other because the alternative was closer to my home.
cons: You barely get a raise. One year I got a raise of 30 cents! No future advancement with this company. It was impossible for me to get an upper management position with my master’s degree. Also some providers were complaining for no apparent reason. It felt like I was being micromanaged with micro-aggressions. Managers tend to providers and if you tell them about being yelled at or cursed out you are simply not heard. Also some managers micromanage when they can barely do their jobs.

pros: FHPG is a growing corporation with room for growth. The president really shows he cares about the employees and actively meets with us every month to address questions and concerns from all staff.
cons: Due to the corporation being fairly new, there are growing pains. The progress is showing significantly however.

job_title: Front Office in Wesley Chapel, FL
pros: Excellent work environment, beautiful campus, wonderful staff and patients, you will learn more than you think, true sense of teamwork
cons: Pay could be better because we do more than our job descriptions

pros: multiple locations. ok benefits. 10 hour shifts. Blocked out lunch

review_title: This company is a joke. Extremely unorganized.
pros: None. There is no pro to working here. The company is very unorganized for such a large company. Horrible experience
cons: Unorganized in all departments, HR doesn't put account numbers in correctly so you won't get paid. Spent 2 weeks sitting with no windows login because IT didn't know what they were doing.
